title: Fort Davis National Historic Site: El Paso to Fort Davis
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation     Maps     El Paso to Fort Davis                Map from El Paso to Fort Davis          Â   From El Paso take I-10 east to Van Horn.  At Van Horn Take Highway US-90 east.  Just south of Valentine take Highway 505 and then 166 east.  Turn left on Highway 17 and follow it to the Fort or continue south of Highway 90 to Marfa and then turn left on Highway 17 to Fort Davis. Alternate Route: From Van Horn take I-10 east to Kent and then turn south on Highway 118 to the Fort. (About 4 hours)
